Meteara: Your kind disturbs the Vok. Should they ever destroy another 
sphere, I will go on Vector Earth and cleanse it, one way or another. 
If you do not wish to be a witness of this, then you can leave.

She gives him a side glance and looks back at the planet, crosses her 
arms, and wait. She waits until either another alarm goes off, or 
until Firaxis says something else.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Firaxis::
>        "Well, actually I couldn't care less what happens here.  I, 
well ... 
> my dog died and I came here to get a new one.  Unfortunately I'm a 
few 
> million years too early."  He glares back at her.  "And I don't much 
like 
> your referring to my kind that way."
